title: Ticket #2073: Document pithy gotchas when upgrading form v7.4 to v7.6
description:
Ticket title says all - we'd like the manual to have one pithy section detailing major gotchas admins should be aware of when upgrading form v7.4 to v7.6. For example, our RPMs now install Condor to a different location than in the past, etc.

This section will appear in the Version History, before the v7.6.0 section.
remarks:

Pushed into CONDOR_DOC repo [V7_6_0-branch e60b488]
